import axios from "axios" import useSwr from "swr" export default function Footer() { const fetcher = async (url) => await axios.get(url).then(res => res.data) const { data, error } = useSwr(`${process.env.API_URL}static/config`, fetcher, { revalidateOnFocus: false }) console.log(data); return (
